articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Songdowon International Children's Camp
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Songdowon International Children's Camp
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent gifts to the Songdowon International Children's Camp.
					 He turned the children's camp associated with the leadership feats of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into a wonderful extracurricular education base.
					
					 He attended the ceremony for the completion of the camp in which  the statues of the Generalissimos were erected, watched a final match of the national children's football contest, enjoyed a congratulatory performance of the Moranbong Band and saw fireworks being displayed, spending the whole day with schoolchildren.
					
					 This time he sent goods for cultural use and kitchen utensils for cooking practice.
					
					 A ceremony for conveying the gifts took place at the camp on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, officials and teachers of the camp.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Demands Judgment of Boss of S. Korean IS
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Demands Judgment of Boss of S. Korean IS
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released its information bulletin No. 1061 on Thursday in connection with full disclosure of truth about the south Korean Intelligence Service(IS)'s involvement in the election.
					 It was disclosed recently that the gentries of the IS distributed a fabulous amount of money for intelligence activities among agents of the psychological warfare group of the Cyber Command under the Defense Ministry during the past "presidential election" in a bid to post articles supporting Park Geun Hye and slandering candidates from opposition parties on internet, the information bulletin said, and went on: 
					
					 This case more clearly proves that the past "presidential election" in south Korea was an entirely fraudulent and conspiratorial farce.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is zealously shielding Nam Jae Jun, IS boss, despite the strong public accusations in south Korea because she was greatly indebted to Nam.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove what despicable accomplices Park and Nam are.
					
					 Nam is the kingpin and arch criminal of the confrontation racket and smear campaign against the DPRK. 
					
					 Under the patronage of Park Nam is craftily working to shirk the responsibility for the above-said case, taking advantage of the atmosphere prevailing throughout south Korea which looks like a mourner's house due to the ferry Sewol sinking, but the public will never pardon him.
					
					 South Korean public should disband the IS, the general headquarters of conspiratorial plots, and sternly judge Nam together with Park.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Cambodian King
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, on May 1 received a congratulatory message from Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia.
					 The message said:
					
					 Most respected Your Excellency,
					
					 I am pleased to extend warm congratulations to Your Excellency upon your reelection as first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission on behalf of the Senate, Parliament, government and people of the Kingdom of Cambodia and on my own behalf.
					
					 I sincerely estimate that the DPRK is achieving great successes in all fields for the country's development and prosperity and playing an important role in the region and other parts of the world under the outstanding leadership of Your Excellency.
					
					 I express belief that the historic unity and friendly and cooperative relations between the two peoples of the Kingdom of Cambodia and the DPRK would grow stronger.
					
					 Please accept my noblest tribute to Your Excellency.

articles.title: Governor-General of New Zealand Hopes for Boosting Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Governor-General of New Zealand Hopes for Boosting Relations with DPRK
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Ryul, DPRK ambassador to New Zealand, presented his credentials to the governor-general of the country on May 1.
					 The governor-general said:
					
					 I wish the Korean people greater success in the work for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 I am pleased that the DPRK is achieving successes in various fields by directing primary efforts to the economic development.
					
					 I hope the relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the China Institute of Contemporary International Relations headed by Vice-President Fu Mengzi visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic career of his family, members of the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved with much care at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They visited revolutionary historic relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 After the visit Fu Mengzi said:
					
					 Family members of the President with the noble intention of loving the country, nation and people dedicated themselves to the struggle for the country's independence. I came to know about the Korean people's profound reverence for him, seeing a lot of people from all walks of life, youth and students and service personnel visiting Mangyongdae.
					
					 The guests also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Grand People's Study House, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Comes Back Home
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Comes Back Home
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) headed by Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Kim Tong Son came back home Thursday after visiting Cuba.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting Marks World Day of Red Cross and Red Crescent
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting Marks World Day of Red Cross and Red CrescentS
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting to mark the World Day of Red Cross and Red Crescent took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Thursday under the co-sponsorship of the DPRK Red Cross Society and the delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross working in the DPRK.
					 Attending the meeting were Kang Su Rin, chairperson of the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society, and officials of the society, officials concerned and members of the delegations and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here. 
					
					 The meeting briefed on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the strengthening of the Red Cross Society, a proud path covered by it and the activities of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross.
					
					 The participants talked about more briskly conducting Red Cross activities.
					
					 Colorful events were also held at branches of the Red Cross Society on the same occasion.

articles.title: Fishermen of KPA January 8 Fishery Station Move to New Houses
articles.content:
Fishermen of KPA January 8 Fishery Station Move to New Houses
Wonsan, May 8 (KCNA) -- Fishermen moved to new houses at the Tanphung Village for Fishermen fashionably built on the shore of the East Sea of Korea. The village is a cradle of fishermen in which all living conditions are provided to meet the needs of a highly civilized socialist nation.
					 A meeting of the fishermen of the fishery station was held to move to new houses.
					
					 Present there were KPA generals, employees of the fishery station and their families.
					
					 A speech made by So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, was followed by speeches of others.
					
					 They extended greatest honor and warmest thanks to Kim Jong Un who provided great happiness with fishermen, reflecting boundless reverence and loyalty of all officials, employees and families.
					
					 They called on officials and employees to repay with loyalty to the great benevolence shown by Kim Jong Un by making big fish hauls.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, fishermen moved to new houses.
					
					 KPA generals and officers and officials congratulated the fishermen on their moving to new houses.

articles.title: National Meeting of Artistes to Take Place
articles.content:
National Meeting of Artistes to Take Place
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The 9th national meeting of artistes will be held here in mid-May.
					 The meeting will lay a historic milestone in glorifying the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in building Juche-oriented arts and developing the arts of the DPRK into a powerful ideological weapon for accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause under the guidance of the Party.
					
					 The meeting will make an analysis and review of the achievements and defects in literature and arts in the past and draw experience and lesson from them and, at the same time, discuss the tasks before the creators and artistes to creditably perform their role as pacemakers of the times to meet the purpose and mission of the Songun revolutionary literature and arts and the ways to do so.
					
					 It will bring together creators, artistes and officials in the field of literature and arts and the units concerned.

articles.title: Book on Resources for Naturopathy Published in DPRK
articles.content:
Book on Resources for Naturopathy Published in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The book "General Review on Resources for Naturopathy in DPRK" was published in the DPRK.
					 The book in five volumes deals with those areas of spas, mud, streams, climate and landscapes favorable for disease treatment in different parts of the country.
					
					 Vol. 1 (Spa Resources) gives a full detail of the number and locations, components and therapeutic values of spas.
					
					 Vol. 2 (Mud Resources) expounds on the locations of mud resources across the country, their qualities, characteristics and therapeutic effect on diseases.
					
					 Vol. 3 (Stream Resources) gives scientific answers to making effective use of stream resources for improving the health of working masses, while systematizing the remedies based on the resources.
					
					 Vol. 4 (Resources for Climatic Treatment) features the history of climatic treatment, successes achieved through the study into it and the world's trend toward it as well as methods of climate treatment.
					
					 Vol. 5 (Landscape Resources) gives publicity of scenic spots with clear seasonal changes and diverse fauna and flora resources, which are helpful to improving human health.

articles.title: Rice-Transplanting Starts in South Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
Rice-Transplanting Starts in South Hwanghae Province
Haeju, May 8 (KCNA) -- Rice-transplanting started in rural areas of South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK.
					 The agricultural workers and officials are registering successes in rice-transplanting after cultivating strong rice seedlings by sowing and tending seedling beds carefully.
					
					 Farms in Anak, Pyoksong and Jaeryong counties are concentrating their efforts on ensuring quality of rice-transplanting through technological guidance in conformity with the growth of seedlings and the climate in the relevant areas.
					
					 The agricultural workers of Haeju City and Yonan and Paechon counties are pushing forward rice-transplanting while giving priority to plowing of paddy fields, irrigation and harrowing and increasing the operation rate of rice-transplanting machines.
					
					 After cultivating strong rice seedlings under the unfavorable condition in which drought persists, farms in Sinchon, Songhwa and Samchon counties are stepping up rice-transplanting after shaping detailed plans according to date and fields.
					
					 Ongjin and Kangryong counties are transplanting rice seedlings in huge areas every day while leveling field and ensuring the number of rice plants per phyong and the number of rice plants per bunch as required by the Juche farming method.
					
					 Chongdan, Unchon and other counties are speeding up rice- transplanting by rationally distributing rice-transplanting machine drivers, rice seedling suppliers and water caretakers.

articles.title: Rice-transplanting Preparations Gain Momentum in DPRK
articles.content:
Rice-transplanting Preparations Gain Momentum in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Preparations for rice-transplanting are gaining momentum in co-op farms in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 The Ministry of Agriculture and the agricultural offices in provinces, cities and counties have taken timely measures needed for rice-transplanting on the basis of detailed survey of its preparations in co-op farms.
					
					 Big efforts are directed to managing rice seedbeds in a scientific way in conformity with their specific features.
					
					 Farms have given priority to reconditioning existing irrigation facilities and improving waterways in order to ensure adequate water supply.
					
					 They have also pressed ahead with the work to secure spare parts of farm machines, including rice-transplanting machines.
					
					 Meanwhile, precedence is given to watering and harrowing paddy fields.

articles.title: Literature and Art Revolution in DPRK
articles.content:
Literature and Art Revolution in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The human history of literature and art development records renaissance that took place in Korea in the 20th century, the most popular and revolutionary socialist renaissance based on the Juche idea.
					 The great development of the Juche-based literature and arts in the DPRK, representing the socialist renaissance in the era of independence, was made through a gigantic revolution guided by leader Kim Jong Il, the genius of literature and art.
					
					 Before a new renaissance in Korea, which was witnessed in the period from the latter half of the 1960s to the first half of the 1970s, the development of human literature and art had faced serious difficulties due to the rotten capitalist trend of literature and arts and the imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 Penetrating deep into such situation, Kim Jong Il clarified that the building of Juche-oriented literature and arts in the era of independence should be carried out through a radical revolution.
					
					 He declared the revolution in literature and arts as an acute class struggle in the ideological and cultural fields and energetically led the work to build the Juche-based literature and arts, fresh in all aspects -- content and style, system and method of creation --.
					
					 To this end, he defined the literature and arts created during the anti-Japanese armed struggle as a model for the development of the Juche-oriented literature and arts. 
					
					 And he kindled the flames of the literature and art revolution with the adaptation of celebrated masterpieces, created by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, into various forms of literature and arts as a start.
					
					 The flames brought the tradition of revolutionary cinematic art and a new era of the "The Sea of Blood"-style revolutionary operas and "Songhwangdang"-style dramas, as well as radical development in music, dance, fine art, acrobatics and all other realms of literature and arts. 
					
					 The socialist renaissance serves as the foundations for the steadily developing and blooming Juche-based literature and arts.

articles.title: KCNA Condemns Park Geun Hye Group's Act of Treachery
articles.content:
KCNA Condemns Park Geun Hye Group's Act of Treachery
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea recently implored its American master to re-extend the transfer of the wartime operation control (OPECON), an act of treachery. 
					 The group, in fact, indefinitely extended the transfer under the pretext that "it should be transferred to south Korea only after it has had in place a combat power system capable of identifying, detecting and striking nukes and missiles of the north at an early stage".
					
					 This is an extremely dangerous reckless action to escalate the tensions on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and facilitate the arms race by keeping south Korea under the permanent occupation of the U.S. and as an outpost for starting a war.
					
					 The issue of the transfer of OPECON surfaced as traitor Syngman Rhee transferred it to the U.S. in the early period of the past Korean war. So, this means the south Korean puppet forces allowed themselves to come under a disgraceful yoke.
					
					 The DPRK remains unperturbed by the extension of the transfer for several years or for a century. But it cannot but take note of the issue as it will adversely affect the south Korean people and the regional stability.
					
					 The transfer of OPECON is not a simple issue of transferring the prerogative over the army but is a crucial matter related to the south Korean people's dignity and right to existence.
					
					 The south Korean people have been driven as a shock brigade for confrontation with their fellow countrymen in the north and as cannon fodder for a war of aggression over the past six decades as they were deprived of OPECON.
					
					 As south Korea has been left without the political and economic arteries and OPECON, it has paid a huge amount of money to U.S. forces for their upkeep and its many people fell victim to all sorts of crimes committed by aggressors.
					
					 Hence, the south Korean people have staged actions to take back OPECON for the past several decades. South Korea was expected to take over it by April, 2012.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak, traitor without an equal, extended it for three years.
					
					 But the Park group went the lengths of agreeing to extend it for an indefinite period.
					
					 It stooped to any act of treachery. In exchange for the re-extension the group met the U.S. request for purchasing various types of U.S.-made military hardware, bringing huge profits to its munitions industries, covering increasing expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea and joining in the building of the missile shield.
					
					 Does the world know such wicked quisling as Park?
					
					 She is, indeed, a top class sycophant and traitor and philistine without an equal.
					
					 The recent action taken by the puppet group has further tightened the U.S. political, military and economic domination and subjugation of south Korea and made its people suffer more from foreign forces' moves for aggression. The Park group extended the transfer of OPECON at a time when the whole of south Korea turned into a mourner's house in the wake of the ferry Sewol disaster. This is a thrice-cursed crime against the nation.
					
					 Facts go to prove that the south Korean people can neither get rid of the yoke of colonial slavery nor escape a nuclear disaster as long as Park is allowed to stay in office.
					
					 All Koreans will certainly force the Park Geun Hye group to pay for all its crimes committed against the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Comments on Park Geun Hye's "Doctrine of Gaining Great Opportunity of Unification"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Comments on Park Geun Hye's "Doctrine of Gaining Great Opportunity of Unification"
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The ghost-like watchword "Gaining a great opportunity of unification" is afloat in south Korea these days.
					 Park Geun Hye is making much fuss about getting ready for "unification" and "forming a preparatory committee for unification", talking about "gaining a great opportunity of unification" whenever a chance presented itself.
					
					 She also vociferated about the watchword during her trips to neighboring countries and even during her European junket.
					
					 Philistines and media of her puppet regime are also staging charades about studying the watchword, oft-repeating it.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on May 8 observes in its commentator's article: "The doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" is a heinous "doctrine of confrontation of the social systems" and "doctrine of achieving unification of the social systems". It is also a "doctrine of war against the DPRK" and "a doctrine of nuclear disaster".
					
					 The strange watchword "Gaining a great opportunity" fully reflects the base and ugly nature of philistinism, mammonism that one can lure people with money and it is everything.
					
					 It is painful and shameful that the country remains divided though nearly 70 years have passed since the partition of the country.
					
					 It is a vicious mockery and insult to the wishes of the Korean nation for reunification to deny the basic nature of the issue of the reunification of the country and describe it as a bargaining chip for dealers and gamblers.
					
					 Her doctrine is nothing but the daydream of "achieving unification of the social systems" veiled with the above-said watchword presupposing the "unification under American- style liberal democracy" and the "German-style reunification".
					
					 The "unification of the social systems" precisely means the "confrontation of the social systems".
					
					 The differing ideologies and social systems exist in the north and the south of Korea and both do not want to abandon them. To insist on achieving the unification of the social systems under this situation means seeking confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and denying the peaceful reunification, in the final analysis.
					
					 It is all the more ridiculous for her to peddle the said doctrine, obsessed with the "daydream of contingency and collapse." 
					
					 It is south Korea that is on the brink of collapse and "contingency".
					
					 Great irony is that she is busy uttering the watchword, foolishly dreaming of the "collapse of the north," at a time when the whole of south Korea looks like a mourner's house and she is at deathbed. 
					
					 The group of killers, the hordes of traitors, whose days are numbered, bitterly cursed by the south Korean people and the nation, claim that they will play a main role in achieving the reunification of the country. This is a tragicomedy that makes the boiled head of a cow provoke a side-splitting laughter.
					
					 Park's group is going more frantic with confrontation and war racket, chanting the above-said watchword.
					
					 Her doctrine will lead only to war disasters.
					
					 It is quite impossible to think about the "gaining of a great opportunity" and "making profits" after south Korea is reduced to ashes, the businesses totally go bankrupt and all the people perish.
					
					 All the facts go to prove that the doctrine touted by Park is no more than an extremely vicious traitorous and anti-reunification sophism intended to hide her group's sinister true colors, mislead the public opinion and more desperately kick up anti-reunification hysteria.
					
					 Park is now finding herself in a tight corner, left without any achievement in more than one year of her office. Therefore, she is working hard to improve her image by making her doctrine prove "effective." This, however, will invite only bitterer condemnation from all Koreans and foreigners and shame.
					
					 South Korea is now swept by the waves of dynamic popular actions against Park's regime. 
					
					 Her unpopular and traitorous true colors have been brought to light. Her regime may collapse and she would be punished anytime just as ferry "Sewol" sank.
					
					 She must not make a mockery of the nation over the issue of reunification.
					
					 Just as traitor Lee Myung Bak suffered a miserable fate after coming under the fire of the nation for talking about the "unification pot" to make an ass of the inviolable issue of reunification, Park will face a more miserable end if she persists in the gambling with such watchword.
					
					 She must not forget the tragedy of her father Park Chung-Hee who went reckless with anti-reunification confrontation and the moves to invade the north, trumpeting about "miracle on the bank of the River Han," copying the "miracle on the bank of the River Rhine" in Germany.
					
					 The nation can never tolerate criminal doctrine and it is bound to go bankrupt in face of the rebuff and denunciation of all Koreans.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Frustrating Imperialists' Ideological, Cultural Poisoning
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Frustrating Imperialists' Ideological, Cultural Poisoning
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Only when the revolutionary discipline and order are strictly established in all fields and units, is it possible to thoroughly defend the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism and certainly win a victory in the confrontation with imperialism.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article on Thursday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Everything goes well in places where discipline and order are properly established but if not, there always happen abnormal things.
					
					 It is just such evil ideas and spirits as liberalism which raise their heads before anything else in places where revolutionary discipline and order are not established.
					
					 Anybody engrossed in liberalism dislikes making revolution and working and wants to idle away. It is none other than the imperialist reactionary idea and culture which find their way to such ideological viewpoint.
					
					 The hostile elements and counterrevolutionary forces conspired with imperialists surely come into being in the places where indiscipline and disorder are rampant.
					
					 There have taken place the illegal change of powers and social confusion in various countries in recent years because the imperialists gave the hostile elements and counterrevolutionary forces a shot in the arm to do so.
					
					 If indiscipline and disorder are created in the ideological and cultural field and ideological officials fail to fulfill their duty, the whole society will be poisoned by the reactionary idea and culture of the imperialists.
					
					 The imperialists have built broadcasting systems and websites over the world, leaving no means untried to spread the reactionary idea and culture in different languages.
					
					 If the ideological and cultural field fails to discharge its obligation under such situation, it will not explain the idea and policies of its state and party in time and, in the long run, will be defeated in the ideological offensive against imperialists.
					
					 Only when the steel-like discipline and order are established, can the advantages and might of the most excellent idea and social system be displayed.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Their Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Their Moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a joint statement on May 2 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for their moves against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 U.S. President Obama made reckless remarks against the DPRK during his recent junket to south Korea.
					
					 Obama and Park Geun Hye ran amuck in the anti-DPRK smear campaign, talking about the "nuclear issue" of the DPRK.
					
					 The head of the U.S. has prodded the UN to slap sanctions against the DPRK. This time he was closeted with his stooge to slander the DPRK's nuclear development for self-defence and peaceful purposes.
					
					 The U.S. is disqualified to talk about human rights of other countries as it is the kingpin of human rights abuses who ignited wars in different parts of the world, killed innocent civilians and caused hunger and poverty through arms race.
					
					 We resolutely denounce the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for resorting to reckless moves against the DPRK.
					
					 We positively support the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the moves of the enemies.

articles.title: Action for Judging Park Geun Hye Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Judging Park Geun Hye Regime Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People Wednesday released an editorial denouncing the puppet authorities for turning their back on the ferry Sewol sinking accident.
					 Park Geun Hye is trying to calm down the public criticism of her and pass the buck for the accident to others, it noted.
					
					 It accused her of putting forward "reform" logic, claiming that the accident is ascribable to the wrong practices which have long been connived at.
					
					 Such behavior of the present regime is lashing the people into fury with distrust, it said, calling upon all progressive and democratic forces to judge the Park regime in the forthcoming June 4 local election.

articles.title: Stop to Inhuman Military Education Demanded
articles.content:
Stop to Inhuman Military Education Demanded
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea issued a commentary on May 4 demanding the puppet authorities stop the inhuman military education.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 Several students lost their lives due to coercive military training enforced by the authorities in Thaean, South Chungchong Province last year.
					
					 Nearly 300 days have passed since then. But, the bereaved families still suffer from pains and sorrow as the probe into the truth has not been made and those responsible have not been punished.
					
					 This is a result of the inhuman attitude of the authorities to the students.
					
					 The authorities should stop the inhuman military education and opt to thoroughly probe the truth behind the case and punish those responsible for it.

articles.title: Japan's Redemption of Its Crimes Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Redemption of Its Crimes Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Victims to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, members of public organizations and young people in south Korea held a ceremony of unveiling a monument to peace which depicts the victims to the sexual slavery in Suwon, Kyonggi Province, on May 3.
					 People from all walks of life in south Korea erected a peace monument in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul for the first time on December 14, 2011 as part of their actions to force Japan to settle its crimes.
					
					 Since then similar monuments have been erected in Koje of South Kyongsang Province and Koyang and Songnam of Kyonggi Province amid fiercer anti-Japanese actions across south Korea.
					
					 Speakers at the ceremony noted that the Korean nation is demanding Japan prevent the recurrence of its past crimes and make a legal apology and reparation for them.
					
					 They declared that they would conduct more dynamic actions for the reinstatement of the victims to the sexual slavery and human rights and expand them worldwide.
					
					 They called for vigorous solidarity actions until Japan redeems its past crimes.

articles.title: KPA Praised by Russian Paper
articles.content:
KPA Praised by Russian Paper
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The 16th issue of the Russian paper Veteran carried an article titled "Annals of glorious struggle" on the occasion of the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The paper said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, the revolutionary armed forces, on April 25, 1932.
					
					 It fought against the brigandish Japanese imperialists with neither state support nor home front and liberated the country.
					
					 The KPA developed into a regular army under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung after the liberation. It won a brilliant victory in the 3-year war for defending freedom, independence and the gains of revolution from the aggression by the ferocious U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and the imperialist allied forces of 15 satellite states.
					
					 The KPA honorably defended the gains of revolution, smashing all the ceaseless war provocation moves of the U.S. imperialists such as the armed spy ship Pueblo incident, the large spy plane EC-121 incident, the Panmunjom incident, etc. in the 1960s and the 1970s.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, directed the primary efforts to strengthening the military capability, holding high the banner of Songun late in the 20th century.   Therefore, the KPA further developed politically, ideologically and in military technique and grew to be an elite army capable of smashing any imperialist aggression at a go.
					
					 It is creating new miracles and innovations at every worksite for socialist economic construction under the slogan of "Let the People's Army take charge of both national defence and socialist construction!"
					
					 The victorious history of the KPA will be given a steady continuity along with the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de rey de Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de rey de Cambodia
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia primero el rey de Cambodia Norodom Sihamoni.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia mas respetado,
					
					Pienso alegre extenderle mi calurosa felicitacion en nombre del Senado, Parlamento,  gobierno y pueblo del reino de Cambodia y en el mio propio, en ocasion de la reeleccion de Su Excelencia como Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC.
					
					Evaluo con sinceridad lo que bajo la direccion destacada de su Excelencia, la RPDC logra grandes exitos en todos los dominios para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais y desempena el importante papel en la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones historicas para la solidaridad, la amistad y la cooperacion entre los pueblos de ambos paises sigan fortaleciendose y desarrollandose en el futuro tambien.
					
					Reciba mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la mudanza a nuevas casas en la Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero de EPC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la mudanza a nuevas casas en la Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero de EPC
Wonsan, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- Se efectuo el dia 8 la mudanza de los pescadores de la Empresa Pesquera 8 de Enero del Ejercito Popular de Corea a la moderna aldea pesquera Tanphung, levantada a la orilla del Mar Este de Corea gracias al noble amor por el pueblo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					Antes de la mudanza, tuvo lugar un acto de los pescadores.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los generales del EPC, los empleados de la citada empresa y sus familiares.
					
					El primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, So Hong Chan, pronuncio un discurso y otros intervinieron.
					
					Traduciendo la infinita veneracion y la fidelidad de todos los funcionarios, empleados y familiares, los oradores dirigieron el maximo honor y el mas cordial agradecimiento al Mariscal quien dispenso gran benevolencia a los pescadores.
					
					Expresaron la decision de lograr la avalancha de pescados para reciprocar con fidelidad el gran favor del Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los pescadores se mudaron a sus nuevas y modernas viviendas recibiendo las felicitaciones de los generales y los oficiales del EPC y los funcionarios.

articles.title: Efectuados actos por Dia Mundial de Cruz Roja y Medialuna Roja

Efectuados actos por Dia Mundial de Cruz Roja y Medialuna Roja
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Club para el Cuerpo Diplomatico Taedonggang el encuentro de amistad por el Dia Mundial de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja, coauspiciado por la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y las delegaciones de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja y del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja que trabajan en Corea.

articles.title: ACNC comenta aplazamiento de traspaso de mando de operaciones en tiempo de guerra
articles.content:
ACNC comenta aplazamiento de traspaso de mando de operaciones en tiempo de guerra
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- Durante la reciente visita del presidente norteamericano Obama al Sur de Corea, la banda de Park Geun-hye le suplico posponer nuevamente el traspaso del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra cometiendo asi un crimen antinacional.
					Los titeres surcoreanos dilataron por tiempo indefinido el traspaso de ese mando al ejercito surcoreano bajo el pretexto de que "eso debe ser realizado despues de perfeccionar el sistema de distinguir, detectar y atacar en etapa inicial las armas nucleares y los misiles del Norte de Corea (RPDC)".
					
					Al convertir el Sur de Corea en la eterna base militar de EE.UU. y en un foco de guerra, ellos tratan de agravar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region del Nordeste Asiatico y fomentar la carrera armamentista.
					
					El problema de traspaso del mando de operaciones se lo han buscado los mismos titeres surcoreanos cuando el traidor Syngman Rhee lo entrego a EE.UU. a principios de la pasada guerra coreana.
					
					Si bien no nos preocupa ni un comino el aplazamiento de varios anos o un siglo, nos vemos obligados a comentarlo en vista de sus consecuencias negativas para la estabilidad de los habitantes surcoreanos y la region.
					
					El traspaso del mando no es un simple problema de entrega y recibo de la autoridad militar sino el asunto importante relacionado con la dignidad y el derecho a la vida de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Durante mas de 60 anos, por culpa de EE.UU. apoderado del mismo mando militar, ellos tuvieron que servir como brigada de choque y carne de canon en la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida y la guerra de agresion.
					
					Privados de las arterias politicas y economicas y hasta del mando militar, se vieron obligados a cubrir enormes gastos de mantenimiento de las tropas ocupantes y ser victimas de crimenes cometidos por estos agresores.
					
					Por eso, la poblacion surcoreana lucho intensamente durante varios decenios por recuperar el mando hasta que su traspaso fuera programado para abril de 2012.
					
					Pero, el vendepatria Lee Myung Bak lo prorrogo 3 anos mas y los compinches de Park acordaron retrasarlo esta vez por tiempo indefinido.
					
					A cambio de eso, la banda de Park asumio el compromiso de comprar los armamentos de guerra de EE.UU. que daran fabulosas ganancias a los mercaderes de guerra, pagar mas gastos de mantenimiento de tropas yanquis en suelo surcoreano e incorporarse al sistema de defensa antimisiles de EE.UU.
					
					?En donde se puede encontrar a una vendepatria como Park, que insatisfecha con entregar a las fuerzas extranjeras el mando militar, mendiga la dilacion de su devolucion y regala hasta fabulosos fondos preparados a costa de sangre y sudor del pueblo?
					
					Debido a la dilacion de traspaso del mando, el Sur de Corea se sometera al dominio politico, militar y economico mas fuerte de EE.UU. y los surcoreanos sufriran mas perdidas debido a las acciones agresivas de fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Para colmo, el aplazamiento tuvo lugar cuando todo el suelo surcoreano estaba de luto por el hundimiento del barco "Sewol".
					
					La realidad demuestra que sin castigar a Park, los habitantes surcoreanos no podran liberarse del destino de esclavo colonial ni evitar el desastre nuclear.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana liquidara las cuentas de los actos criminales antinacionales de la horda de Park Geun-hye.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta doctrina antinacional de Park Geun-hye en cuanto a reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta doctrina antinacional de Park Geun-hye en cuanto a reunificacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, recorre como fantasma en el Sur de Corea la palabra "Thong-il Taebak" (cajon de tesoros para la unificacion).
					La mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye hace propaganda de esa doctrina hasta en su gira por los paises vecinos y los europeos y se mueve ajetreada hablando de la "preparacion de unificacion" y la "constitucion del comite preparatorio para la unificacion".
					
					Los politiqueros inferiores de Park y los medios venales se hacen eco de la palabra "Thong-il Taebak" y realizan el supuesto estudio de ella.
					
					En el articulo de un comentarista divulgado el dia 8, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica esa palabra como doctrina de "confrontacion de regimenes" y "unificacion mediante la fusion de los mismos" que persigue la guerra anti-RPDC y busca desastres nucleares.
					
					La extrana palabra "Thong-il Taebak" refleja la sucia concepcion de que con el dinero se resuelve lo todo, asi senala el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Es un dolor y verguenza que la reunificacion se haya realizado todavia aunque transcurrieron casi 70 anos desde la division del pais.
					
					Para colmo, al rehusar el caracter principal del problema de reunificacion de la patria, Park Geun-hye lo describe como materia de regateo de los negociantes y juego al azar, lo cual es una burla e insulto sobre el anhelo de reunificacion de los compatriotas.
					
					La doctrina de "Thong-il Taebak" entrana la irrisoria ambicion sobre la "unificacion de regimenes", consistente en unificar a Corea bajo el regimen democratico liberal de modo norteamericano y por el estilo de Alemania.
					
					La "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" significa la "confrontacion de los mismos".
					
					Ahora en el Norte y el Sur de Corea existen las ideologias y regimenes diferentes y ambas partes no quieren abandonar los suyos. En este caso, insistir en la unificacion de regimenes persigue el enfrentamiento total entre los connacionales siendo la negativa a la reunificacion pacifica.
					
					Es muy absurdo que Park divulgara la doctrina "Thong-il Taebak", ilusionada de la llamada "situacion de emergencia" y "derrumbe" de alguien.
					
					Hoy dia, el Sur de Corea afronta la "situacion de emergencia" y el "derrumbe".
					
					Es una tragicomedia que la horda de asesinos y traidores, que repudiada por la opinion publica y la nacion, tratara de "guiar" la reunificacion.
					
					Detras del cartel "Thong-il Taebak", la banda de Park Geun-hye lanza mas que nunca la campana de confrontacion y guerra que causara flagelos de guerra.
					
					?Cual "tesoro" o "fortuna casual" se podra obtener cuando el Sur de Corea sea devastado, las empresas se reduzcan a cenizas y los hombres resulten muertos debido a la guerra?
					
					La realidad demuestra que esa doctrina de Park no pasa de ser un sofisma antinacional y anti-reunificacion, orientado a encubrir su sucia naturaleza, enganar la opinion publica y recrudecer la campana de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Aunque Park Geun-hye, quien no ha alcanzado nada durante mas de un ano de su mandato, quiere mejorar su imagen al lograr algun "efecto" de la teoria "Thong-il Taebak", sera denunciada y avergonzada mas en el interior y exterior del pais.
					
					Actualmente, se hace mas fuerte la lucha masiva contra el "poder" de Park.
					
					Ya quedo revelada la naturaleza antipopular y antinacional de Park y el "poder" de ella caera como fue hundido el barco "Sewol".
					
					Park no tiene que burlar a la nacion con el problema de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Si continua portandose asi, sufrira la verguenza mas grande que la sufrida por Lee Myung Bak quien insulto el problema de reunificacion hablando del supuesto "cantaro de unificacion".
					
					Park no debe olvidar el destino tragico de su padre Park Chung Hee, quien se dedicaba al enfrentamiento anti-reunificacion y a las maniobras belicas a la RPDC preconizando el "milagro del rio Han" al imitar el "milagro del rio Rhine" en Alemania.
					
					La teoria criminal de ella no sera admitida nunca y sera frustrada sin falta por el rechazo unanime de todos los connacionales.

articles.title: RPDC en preparativos de trasplantacion de posturas de arroz
articles.content:
RPDC en preparativos de trasplantacion de posturas de arroz
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los campos de granjas cooperativas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea estan en visperas de la estacion de trasplantacion de posturas de arroz.
					Los funcionarios del Ministerio de Agricultura y de las provincias, ciudades y distritos de la rama organizan minuciosamente las operaciones y mandos agricolas conforme a las condiciones meteorologicas y climaticas primaverales de las regiones correspondientes y al estado del crecimiento de las posturas de arroz.
					
					Averiguan en detalles del estado de preparativos de trasplantacion de arroz de las granjas cooperativas y toman a tiempo las medidas necesarias.
					
					Los trabajadores agricolas administran de manera cientifico-tecnica las parcelas de posturas de arroz para cultivarlas sana y fuertemente.
					
					Utilizan con eficacia los equipos de riegos y arreglan los canales de riego para elevar la capacidad de paso de agua.
					
					Preparan con suficiencia los accesorios de reserva de las maquinas agricolas elevando asi la tasa de sus funciones.
					
					Aceleran sustancialmente los procesos precedentes de trasplantacion de arroz tales como la retencion de agua en los arrozales, el gradeo y la formacion de lindes.
